Extraordinary comfort will surround your pet in these dreamy dog beds by Bowsers. Looks great after every wash. Unique, 2-piece design. Removable tufted inner dog mat can be used as a travel bed or dog crate pad. Tufting creates an elegant upholstered look and ensures no clumping or shifting when washing the mat. Removable, zippered, washable outer cover.
